name: Skyros
description:
"The mother who has a boat and a fishing rod in the middle of the sea gives birth on the boat. The woman who is traveling with her child loses her life and the child continues to sail in the endless seas. One day, the child stumbles upon an island and lands on that island. And he starts to survive.

Skyros is a survival game on an island. There are lots of features in this game such as zombies, crafting, hunger and thirst. The game is still in development. The version of this game is currently 0.1.  We will continue to develop the game with more innovative ideas in the new version.
